page.description: Start a polygon at a point.

argument.name: XPos
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the first point of the polygon. Numeric

argument.name: YPos
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the first point of the polygon. Numeric

page.discussion: The START_POLY() function begins a polygon by setting its initial point. Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().
page.example: ui_bitmap_create("test", 4, 2) ui_bitmap_draw("test", inner_Rect(0, 0, 4, 2) set_brush("green") set_pen("black") start_poly(2, .5) lineto(3, 1) lineto(1, 1.5) poly(2, .5) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=test}")
